p:
Free fatty acid content was determined by a standard titrimetry method ( Ghadge and Raheman, 2005). The samples (5 g) were mixed with 100 mL of ethanol/ether solution (1:2, v/v) and the mixture was titrated against 0.1 N potassium hydroxide with 1% phenolphthalein as an indicator. Acid value (AV) was calculated with the following equation:
AV (mg KOH/g) = 5 .611 ×
(
a − b
)
/ W
